name: Alien Slayers
description:
Space, the final frontier filled with hostile aliens. You've been hired to slay the aliens and complete the mission, but the native creatures won't take it easy. Grab your weapon and survive to the end to become the strongest alien.

Controls

  • [Arrow] / [WASD] / [Numpad] to move character
  • [Space bar] to use character skill
  • [Enter] to Select
  • [Esc] to Back

Features

  • Auto-firing weapons and reloading
  • Various character and mission
  • Over 40+ Equipments, Training, Drone, Skill, Perk, Mutant systems
